title: is Ascension game mode ever going to comeback?
body:
i honestly loved this gamemode with a burning passion 

and i just want to know if Riot is considering making one of the most intense game modes ever back to the list


"only ten of you? how disappointing" - Xerath 2014

replies.body:
i loved that game mode to.

Love how it was designed for everyone to have equal income and levels through out the game

That Honestly was the GOLDEN rule

it don't matter what you build, it don't matter what you do, no one is behind! it's honestly one of my favorites things in ascension by far


i also loved how you can trap someone in one of those circles, you and your team chase someone and BAM you reach the circle and everyone just laughs


i loved that so much

Ascension was my favourite game mode. 

I can't stand Dominion anymore after playing Ascension.

But god, please, if they reinstate it, don't give us another icon to earn by denying ascension to the other team. That was just straight toxic.

i honestly loved the icon aspect the most

some play for the fun of it, to shed the blood
some play for the icon

you just CANNOT deny the icon Factor added a unique spice to the gamemode

No reason it shouldn't; several gamemodes have come back.

Maybe, if you start asking in every single Riot post, you'll get it back.

Game modes should be far more often.

LoL is super-stale game. We get new champions but in most cases we almost always play against similar teams. We got just 1 map that gets 99,999% of Riots attention. Game gets repetitive pretty damn fast...


Fyi guys, you might now know it, but HotS has about 8 maps. each has "special" thingy like we have Baron. It's hard to get bored.

I think Riot's being a little too cautious when it comes to generating maps. Their was at least 2 iterations of Magma chamber, neither of which got made. I recal the latter one was scraped because their was not much support from the 1v1 and 2v2 standoffs in snowdown showdown. (which the map would have basically replicated) But looking at the maps we already have, Riot really needs to better promote these maps. If TT had a YoloQ and not just Team 3v3s, or if Dominion had Any ranked Q at all, it would greatly increase interest in those modes. 

The abyss is getting attention though. Bunch of items are being made available, new texture updates (check PBE) to make it more inline with the new SR. And Even a new summoner spell, based on the Legend of King Poro. So The game modes do reflect game choices. 

The thing I liked about Accession is that it's 100% a different game, in the sense that your goal isn't to destroy the enemy nexus. But to basically fight each other in a death match while collecting relics and power ups.

Last time Abyss god any of Riots attention was when they wanted to sell winter skins.

Also by telling about HotS i meant Riot could create 5v5 maps with just different lanes etc. So we'd still play 5v5 yet tad different.

They scrapped Magma Chamber because they compared the playtime of One for All (30-40 min game) to Snowdown Showdown (1v1,2v2 about 5 min games) and declared that people aren't interested in it enough.

heroes is good, but there's some stuff in it that's gamebreaking. namely the shared experience. 
if a team gets 2 levels ahead, theres a very strong chance they're going to dominate the rest of the game with no risk of losing barring afks
I heard no one liked it. Most probably just want a pure deathmatch mode
people iddn't like it because riot put an icon in for having a perfect game. therefore a lot of people wanted a perfect game, and got extremely toxic/threw if they didn't get a perfect game.
If they do bring Ascension back, I have a sinking feeling they'll use it for "rework" some more Shurima related champions .-.
